search.name: Birth Marriage Death Project
search.description:
Search the Birth Marriage Death Project at Rootsweb.com
Switches:
/birth - Search birth records
/marriage - Search marriage records
/death - Search death records
/county:[county name] - Specify county to search in
/state:[state name] (required) - Specify state to search in
Examples:
bmd /d /s:ny jones
